content: data, and historical details. This approach enabled the team to automate processes without needing highly specialized IT skills or expert knowledge of business processes and applications. 114 Simplify Your AI Journey: Unleashing the Power of AI with IBM watsonx.ai © Copyright IBM Corp. 2025. 115 AI artificial intelligence AIaaS AI as a Service BYOM Bring Your Own Model CLI command-line interface CNN convolutional neural network DL deep learning DQN Deep Q-Network ESG environmental, social, and governance FM foundation model gen AI Generative AI IBM International Business Machines Corporation KNN k-nearest neighbor KPI key performance indicator LLM large language model LLMOps large language model operations LoRA low-rank adaptation MAS multi-agent system MDP Markov decision processes ML machine learning MLOps machine learning operations MMLU Massive Multitask Language Understanding NLP natural language processing PCA Principal Component Analysis QLoRA quantized low-rank adaptation RAG
